name: Carnival Horse Racing Game
description:
Circus Horse Racing Game brings the excitement of horse racing to iPhone/IPad, this game is a speed frenzy

Instructions:
Hugely enjoyable roll a ball style horse race games for some very lively entertainment. Just use your finger to roll a ball along your table to (hopefully) drop it through a hole. Every score races your horse along the track and it soon becomes a high speed race to the finish.

Win stars as you race to buy different horses to raise them into derby winners!

Features:
- Simple carnival game play for all ages
- Collect many different horses
- With each new level gained, more horses are unlocked
- Get power-ups!
- Horses come with more speed
- Receive stars during the races!
- Different Horse RaceTrack
